name: Divert holes
description:
A world where you can only get out if you use logic, enthusiasm, a little courage and maybe an extra help ...
The place is divert holes and this time you're not alone, Wig a blue cute monster and a little hairy (any resemblance to a wig is mere coincidence) will help you solve all the challenges of this exciting place!

Solve the challenges, relax and have fun with this new puzzle unheard of in the category!
